name: COLUMBIA BASIN DEVELOPMENT LEAGUE
description: Advocacy group for the completion of the Columbia Basin Project.
sampleDescriptions: Track implementation of Water Infrastructure Improvements for the Nation Act (WIIN Act) PL 114-322

Discuss importance of investing in water infrastructure within the Columbia Basin Project.

Assist in communications with the Bureau of Reclamation for the promotion, funding, and completion of the Columbia Basin Project, specifically providing project water to the Odessa subarea.
